replies.body:

because if 99 gave it, then people would be annoyed getting 98 and it would carry on forever until 1 LP puts you in promotions.
Because your MMR isn't quite good enough to warrant promotion. 99LP is basically the systems way of saying "you got lucky, do it again".
i know a guy who knows a guy, who knows a rioter, who knows a guy, who says he can help you get that 1 lp if ya nam saiyan ;)

team mate be like wtf, but it's good fun XD
Draw a picture for 1 lp <3 if it works for RP it should work for ranked lp
